requirement.reqTitle: Needs to store data and retrieve data without modification
requirement.reqDescription: Data needs to be able to be put into the system and retrieved from it. Current protocols are DICOM and XDS; HL7 or others may be required in the future

requirement.reqTitle: Must support an extensible set of protocols
requirement.reqDescription: Current protocols are DICOM and XDS; HL7 or others may be required in the future

Data must be transportable between gateways without loss or alteration. Data may be encrypted, compressed, fragmented - but when it arrives via whatever protocol on a remote gateway it must be bitwise identical to when it first arrived in the system.

requirement.reqTitle: Data in Repository must be encrypted
requirement.reqDescription: Symmetric keys must be used. See (put in reference to security requirements)

requirement.reqTitle: Data in Repository must have identifier that matches the a useful clinical unit of data.
